snippet.title: ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL Gameplay Reveal Trailer I Wishlist Now
snippet.description:
Wishlist ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL on Steam!
https://bit.ly/AngstATaleOfSurvival

__
“Surviving the wilderness is only the beginning…”
Uncover the mystery of Angst – a quest-driven survival game with simplified roguelite hero development.

🏕️ SURVIVE IN AN OPEN WORLD
Explore a hostile environment, craft tools and weapons, hunt, fish, fight, and do whatever it takes to stay alive.

🌫️ UNCOVER THE MYSTERY OF HOPEWARD HOLLOW
Strangers may ask for your help, but be cautious – how do you know if they want to assist you or trap you here forever?

💡 DEATH IS PART OF THE JOURNEY
Upgrade your skills to venture deeper into the snowy wilderness, but beware: what lurks in the darkness may thwart your plans.
Survive in this mysterious world to uncover why you are here.

Wishlist ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL on Steam!

__
